## Source: ossf-package-analysis (716f32a8a235f3f76baa7d4fdd464cc618414f5d895ef9111764b0dde2844cda)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@contraktor-tech/poc_confusion' @ 99.9.5 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
